page.title: 02AGRICULTURE & FARMS. TREDIS
page.content: Triffle Farm is a modern,factory-type farm.The farmer has systematically demolished hedgerows in order to increase his crop and facilitate the use of giant machinery.He is the leading local potato producer,but this year the crop is mainly cereal at Triffle;potatoes are elsewhere.. Hendra is a mixed farm run on more traditional lines.Here hedgerow demolition is not apparent;the farmer is conservation-conscious.Crops are mainly root,potatoes and arable.He also farms Perdreda (this farmhouse is now derelict). Minard is a mixed farm traditionally-run.The farmer breeds champion Aberdeen Angus cattle and Dorset Horn & Hampshire Down sheep. Other farms are Trewall,Cargloth, Eglaroose(goats),Trewrickle,Tredrossel and Rytha. ,
